name: Bubble Shooter 2019
description:
Play Bubble Shooter to win huge prizes!
Over 2000 free levels with free boosters to play!

Shoot and pop bubbles to blast and get high score!

How to Play:
* Shot bubble bullets to other bubbles!
* Bullets will pop color matched Bubbles!
* Make them all explode!

Features:
* Accumulate bubble energy to get different Items or Skills.
* We have many amazing Items and Skills combinations are waiting for you to explore.
* They will help you to overcome difficult Levels and Achieve higher score!
* The whole process will be very interesting!

Hope you will have a good time!
